snippet: The leader of the coup in the Central African Republic announced that he would serve as both president and defense minister and that fellow rebels would fill other top posts.
abstract: Michel Djotodia, leader of coup in Central African Republic, solidifies his hold on government after announcing that he will serve as both president and defense minister and that fellow rebels will fill other top posts.
lead_paragraph: The leader of the coup in the Central African Republic announced that he would serve as both president and defense minister and that fellow rebels would fill other top posts.

headline.seo: Central African Republic: Coup Leader Solidifies Rebels’ Grip on Government
headline.main: Central African Republic: Coup Leader Solidifies Rebels’ Grip on Government
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Coup Leader Solidifies Rebels’ Grip on Government
